name: Stickman Stairs - Let Him Jump and Dismount
name_original: Stickman Stairs - Let Him Jump and Dismount
description:
!!!FREE!!! Super retro like game, but hard to master!

Your goal is to Jump, jump, jump... and avoid the cracks and collect the coins!
Beat your friends via GameCenter!
Addictive gameplay!

- Swift gameplay
- Awesome retro XD-Engine for the realistic graphics
- Endless and Addictive gameplay
- Beat your friends through GameCenter
- Easy Controls

and one more thing...
- You don't have to replace batteries like in the 80s ;)
